body.name: HOMERHYME Laundry Detergent Sheets - Fresh Linen Scent 120 Loads (60 Sheets),Plastic Free,Laundry Detergent Strips for Travel,Dorms, Home,Apartments,Liquidless Technology,Eco Friendly& Hypoallergenic

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 【TRAVEL-FRIENDLY CONVENIENCE】: Embrace eco-friendliness with our ultra-convenient laundry detergent sheets, your ideal travel companion. These revolutionary sheets are meticulously designed to cater to your wanderlust, dissolving rapidly and efficiently, all while being exceptionally space-efficient. Regardless of your destination, experience the luxury of well-cleaned clothes without the bulk of traditional detergents.

【GENTLE ON SKIN, TOUGH ON STAINS】: Unleash the power of our washing detergent sheets, tailored for the most sensitive skin types. Developed through dermatologist insights, these sheets prioritize a gentle touch, ensuring your skin feels cared for and respected. Don't let the absence of harsh chemicals fool you; these clothes detergent sheets excel in tackling stubborn stains, offering a harmonious blend of gentleness and efficiency that few products can match.

【ZERO WASTE, ECO-FRIENDLY】: Join us in revolutionizing the future with our biodegradable laundry sheets. Say farewell to plastic waste as you embrace a sustainable solution packaged in smart, eco-conscious materials. No longer burden the planet with plastic jugs and bottles; instead, opt for a greener choice that delivers unparalleled performance while leaving a positive impact on the environment.

【INNOVATIVE CLEANING TECHNOLOGY】: Welcome a new era of clean with our innovative laundry detergent strips. Witness the magic of powerful cleaning without the shackles of phosphorus or excess liquids. These sheets dissolve swiftly & completely in hot and cold water, can be used in conventional & HE washing machines. They leave your clothes immaculate and your conscience clear, contributing to a world where effective cleaning aligns with responsible environmental stewardship.

【VERSATILE, EFFECTIVE PERFORMANCE】: Elevate your laundry routine with the reliability of our eco-friendly laundry soap sheets. From home use to traversing the globe, these sheets ensure your garments receive a thorough cleaning that respects both your clothing and the planet. No longer choose between cleanliness and sustainability – with our sheets, you achieve both effortlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to try and reduce waste. I was happy to see these in unscented as I have sensitivity to most scented products. It has zero scent, you just have nice clean clothes. What more could you ask for?! The price is fabulous too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient. Cleans well
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to dislike. Weighs nothing. Takes up no space. Cleans well..but I also enhance my laundry with washing soda and vinegar. Particularly whites.But I have no complaints about this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These work really well for me, even in cold water. I typically use warm water. They dissolve without leaving residue. Easy to store. Priced very well. I will definitely buy again. Clothes are clean, even workout gear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Switched from pods and never going back! I love how well these desolve and how clean my clothes feel. No residue, no funky scent. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great to slip a few in a suitcase. Five star cleaning of beach and hiking clothes. Also works for day to day laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior packaging, laundry soap works!
reviews.reviewText: I love not being packaged in plastic. Soap works well, fragrance free is great with my asthma. I used a 1/2 sheet in medium load and was pleased with the outcome. I HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not sure I will buy again didn’t clean well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very convenient and easy to transport and use.
reviews.reviewText: I kee in my laundry bagand it like that they do not make it heavier to carry to laundramat. Recommend.Have not used long enough to knowabout cleaning power but so far so good!!
